official_title: A bill to amend titles II and XVIII of the Social Security Act to reduce the basic age of entitlement to Medicare benefits from 65 to 62.

summary.text: Reduces the basic age of entitlement to Medicare benefits under titles II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Benefits) and XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act from age 65 to 62.

titles.title: A bill to amend titles II and XVIII of the Social Security Act to reduce the basic age of entitlement to Medicare benefits from 65 to 62.
